vote.question: On the Motion

vote.question: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 4983
vote.title: Kennedy Amdt. No. 4983; To provide emergency assistance for disaster response and recovery, and for other expenses, directly related to Hurricanes Laura, Delta, and Ida and to provide assistance for the Port Infrastructure Development Program.

vote.question: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 4990
vote.title: Braun Amdt. No. 4990; To prohibit funds from being used for earmarks.

vote.question: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 4989
vote.title: Lee Amdt. No. 4989; To prohibit funding for COVID-19 vaccine mandates.

vote.question: On Cloture on the Motion to Proceed
vote.title: Motion to Invoke Cloture: Motion to Proceed to H.R. 3755.; A bill to protect a person's ability to determine whether to continue or end a pregnancy, and to protect a health care provider's ability to provide abortion services.

vote.question: On Passage of the Bill
vote.title: H.R. 6617; A bill making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2022, and for other purposes.

vote.question: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 4930
vote.title: Braun Amdt. No. 4930; To strike the Statutory PAYGO exemption and require balanced budgets in concurrent resolutions on the budget.

vote.question: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 4927
vote.title: Cruz Amdt No. 4927; To prohibit the use of Federal funding for schools and early childhood development facilities that enforce COVID-19 vaccine mandates on children in order to protect the rights of parents to make medical decisions that affect their child.

vote.question: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 4929
vote.title: Lee Amdt. No. 4929; To prohibit funding for COVID-19 vaccine mandates.

vote.question: On the Cloture Motion
vote.title: Motion to Invoke Cloture: Motion to Proceed to H.R. 6617; A bill making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2022, and for other purposes.
